feature.name: personalized-comments-filtering
feature.title: Filter Personalized Comments by Rating and Search Text
feature.description: Add rating-based filtering to FinalCommentsComponent to complement existing typeahead search, allowing teachers to filter available personalized comments by both rating and search query simultaneously

complexity.reasoning: Single component behavior enhancement - reusing existing EmojiRatingSelector component, implementing combined filtering logic in one component, no new API endpoints required, minimal state management changes

businessValue.userImpact: Improves workflow efficiency when selecting personalized comments by enabling quick filtering through both rating preference and search text
